projects.description: This project shows quotes from famous musicians by making a random selection from an array of objects. Aside from the user clicking the button, the app automatically changes the background color and displayed quote every 10 seconds.
Break up a long list of students into separate pages that can be easily viewed. This simple but useful pagination program can work with short or long lists of data.

Validate a submission form to help prepare data to be more usable. This form is for a fictional tech conference. It features validation for textfields, checkboxes, dropdown lists, and won't submit unless multiple criteria are met.

This is a word guessing game that displays a win or lose message at the end of the game. A right guess shows the letter on the game board, while a wrong guess deducts a life point. If you guess the phrase without running out of lives, you win!

Search through a list of employees from an API. Click on an employee's card to view a modal popup with more information about them. Next and previous buttons add functionality from the modal window, so the user can also veiw each of the employee cards containing more detailed information.
